document_data.caption: A map showing Moonstar Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Moonstar Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Moonstar Alley''' was a small side alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Moonstar Alley was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley cut between the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] and the [[Street of Whispers]], enclosing the [[Moonstar (family)|Moonstar]] estate and several other buildings. Another alley called [[Sharra's Flight]] connected with the southern side of Moonstar Alley.
document_data.History: The alley was named for the presence of the Moonstar noble family. However, Waterdeep's first temple to [[Sel√ªne]], called the [[High House of Stars]], was first located here.
